full_summary:
**Hospital Beds Tender Notice**
=====================================

**Title**: Correctional Service Canada - Hospital Beds
------------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number**: WS4164756425
**Publication Date**: November 17, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: December 18, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST

**Note**: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the above-mentioned closing date. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

* **Tender Type**: Call for Proposal
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Goods Classification**: Patient beds and accessories

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

The highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be used to select the contractor.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**

**End User**
------------

* **Correctional Service Canada (CSC)**

**Product Requirements**
-------------------------

Six hospital beds with mattresses are required for the Regional Psychiatric Centre in Saskatoon. The products must be delivered to 2520 Central Ave, Saskatoon, SK, S7K 3X5.

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

* **Name**: Susi Kosmulalage
* **Email**: [susi.kosmulalage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:susi.kosmulalage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not provided
* **Fax**: Not provided
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17812503?extsite=MTc4MTI1MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: This notice has been reformatted for clarity and brevity, while ensuring all the required information is preserved. The contents of the notice remain unchanged. 

 

**Note from the Editor**

In this tender announcement, the contracting authority is the PSPC, and the end-user entity is the CSC. The request for bids requires the provision of six hospital beds with mattresses for a psychiatric facility in Saskatoon, SK. Following the reformatted notice, all the relevant information of this tender notice is summarized. Please review the full tender document or check out the page for further information
